Salesforce Components - FieldMap

Class FieldMap

public without sharing class FieldMap

Wrapper class for the FieldMapping__mdt custom metadata object.


Change History

  • 07/11/2021   Initial version.
  • 07/13/2021   Add support for negative numbers.
  • 02/23/2023   Add support for Hash__c field.
  • 09/02/2024   Class moved from Tools to its own class.

Group:
    Wrapper Classes for Objects

Constructors

public FieldMap(FieldMapping__mdt fieldSet)

Creates a field map from the given custom metadata record.

Parameters:
    fieldSet – Custom metadata FieldMapping__mdt record to initialize the object.
